channel.title: PI Auto Donation Help - It's set up but
channel.description:
I know how to give items automatically, like all I have to do is change the Item IDs in the IPN to the Item I want. But I want to know how to make it so it actually sets the Donator rank on them.
What I mean is upon purchasing Donator, it will edit the account's character file and set: isDonator = 0 to isDonator = 1
How do I edit the IPN to work like that?
Also this can help you (Code from IPN.php): [code] $paylist = array("5.00" => itemId1, "10.00" => itemId2, "50.00" => itemId3); [/code]
